{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Opera Epiclese (Instance)|It|Opera Epiclese}} is a grand, multi-level opera house, complete with raised seating sections and a private VIP area for [[Furina]]. The [[Oratrice Mecanique d'Analyse Cardinale]] is located on the stage below [[Neuvillette]]'s seat, which previously generated [[Indemnitium]] for the [[Court of Fontaine]] through trials.</p>}}

The building also has an underground passage, which acts as a quest-exclusive instance that can be entered during {{Quest|Lies Cast Shadows Under Gathered Lights}}.

==Trivia==
* There is a total seating capacity of 169 in the auditorium, including Furina's seat.
** 110 small seats are on the lower floor.
** 22 small seats and 12 big sofas each with the maximum space for 3 are on the upper floor.
*** Players can sit only in the middle spot of each sofa.
** All seatings in the auditorium are red.
* The rest of the building has an additional 19 sofas 2 benches and Neuvillette's seat.
** 3 sofas in the lobby.
** 4 sofas each at the entrance to the lower and upper floors respectively.
** 8 sofas and 2 benches in the backroom.
*** As with the sofas, while the benches have 3 seats players can only sit in the middle.
